# air-previewer

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type                             | Default    |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | -------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `size`   | `size`    |             | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'` |


## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [air-icon]

## Overview

The `air-previewer` component is designed to display a preview of HTML or JSX code. It supports different sizes for flexibility. By default, it renders in a medium size, but it can be adjusted using the `size` property.

## Example Usage

<air-previewer size="auto">
<div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '1rem', justifyContent: 'center' }}>
  <air-previewer size="small">
  <div>Some content inside the small previewer</div>
</air-previewer>
</div>
</air-previewer>
